mapper.select:
SELECT `a`.`out_id`, `a`.`cp_name`, `a`.`out_date`, `a`.`out_content`, `a`.`out_supp_value`, `a`.`out_total_value`, `a`.`out_collect_value`, `a`.`out_collect_remain`, `b`.`cp_name` AS `cl_code`, `c`.`cst_name` AS `cst_code` FROM (SELECT `out_id`, `cp_name`, `cl_code`, `cst_code`, `out_date`, `out_content`, `out_supp_value`, sum(`out_supp_value`) OVER(PARTITION BY `cst_code`, `cl_code`, `cp_name` ORDER BY `out_id`) AS `out_total_value` , `out_collect_value`, sum(`out_supp_value`) OVER(PARTITION BY `cst_code`, `cl_code`, `cp_name` ORDER BY `out_id`) - sum(`out_collect_value`) OVER(PARTITION BY `cst_code`, `cl_code`, `cp_name` ORDER BY `out_id`) AS `out_collect_remain` FROM `ahaproject`.`outcome` ORDER BY `cp_name`, `cl_code`, `cst_code`) AS `a` LEFT OUTER JOIN `client` AS `b` ON `a`.`cl_code` = `b`.`cl_code` LEFT OUTER JOIN `construction` AS `c` ON `a`.`cst_code` = `c`.`cst_code`
ORDER BY out_id DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}
